title: Backend Development
text: Experienced in scalable backend systems using Java, C#, .NET, Spring Boot, and PHP. Skilled in SQL databases, API integration, and backend architecture.
text_en: Experienced in scalable backend systems using Java, C#, .NET, Spring Boot, and PHP. Skilled in SQL databases, API integration, and backend architecture.
text_jp: Java、C#、.NET、Spring Boot、PHP を使用したスケーラブルなバックエンドシステムの開発経験あり。SQLデータベース、API連携、バックエンドアーキテクチャに精通。

title: Frontend & DevOps
text: Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Bootstrap, and jQuery. Experienced with deployment, AWS, CI/CD pipelines, and web server configuration.
text_en: Proficient in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Bootstrap, and jQuery. Experienced with deployment, AWS, CI/CD pipelines, and web server configuration.
text_jp: HTML、CSS、JavaScript、React、Bootstrap、jQuery に熟練。デプロイ、AWS、CI/CDパイプライン、Webサーバー構成の経験あり。

title: Mobile & Tools
text: Light experience in mobile development. Strong in development tools, remote access utilities, IDEs, testing, and collaborative tools.
text_en: Light experience in mobile development. Strong in development tools, remote access utilities, IDEs, testing, and collaborative tools.
text_jp: モバイル開発の経験は浅いが、開発ツール、リモートアクセスツール、IDE、テスト、コラボレーションツールに強みあり。
